summary: Changes the posture of the female housecarls to be less hulky
descriptionHtml:
Created by request, this changes the posture of your female Housecarls (Lydia, Jordis and Iona) to be less hulky. If you notice, Lydia\'s arms are arched in, whereas other females have their arms straight down. This makes her more butch-looking. Also, her sitting positioning looks less rough and more girly.

Added ver 1.1 - This file includes Jenassa and Mjoll, and integrates the changes made with Reemy88\'s Housecarl clothing mod. I couldn\'t test if it works, because Reemy\'s mod doesn\'t work for me either though.
author: sugaki

files.name: Housecarls stance plus Mjoll and Jenassa
files.fileName: Housecarls stance plus Mjoll and Jenassa-3788-1-2.zip
